Name: Absorbing Prism
Title: Electro Hypostasis: Absorbing Prism
Desc: "Here's our chance!"\n"Hey, it's on our side!"
Source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Electro Hypostasis at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

Talent.Name: Absorbing Prism
Talent.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K1]:</color> When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A2401]</color>, heal that character for 3 HP and attach the <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124014]</color> to them.\n(You must have $[A2401] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C124014.Name: Electro Crystal Core
C124014.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When the character to which this is attached would be defeated:</color> Remove this effect, ensure the character $[K54|s1], and heal them to 1 HP.

K54.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Immunity to Defeat</color>|s1:<color=#FFFFFFFF>will not be defeated</color>
K54.Desc: Certain effects will grant characters an <color=#FFFFFFFF>immunity to being defeated</color> when their HP hits 0, and will heal them for a certain amount thereafter.\nWhen this occurs, characters will not be regarded as having experienced a <color=#FFFFFFFF>defeat.</color> (Hence, their attached equipment and statuses will not be removed, and their Energy will remain uncleared.)
